meanings.definition: Situated or occurring beneath a rib or ribs.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed to the subcostal area on the X-ray.
meanings.sent2: The subcostal pain was sharp and persistent.
meanings.sent3: The cat's subcostal spot was its favorite place to be scratched.
meanings.sent4: The subcostal region housed the vital organs like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The subcostal region felt tender to the touch, indicating an injury.

meanings.definition: Relating to the area below the ribs.
meanings.sent1: She felt a subcostal ache after the intense workout.
meanings.sent2: The subcostal muscles supported her during the long hike.
meanings.sent3: The subcostal region was ticklish when touched.
meanings.sent4: His subcostal strength was evident in his powerful punch.
meanings.sent5: The subcostal area was protected by the sturdy ribcage above.

meanings.sent1: The subcostal incision was healing nicely after the surgery.
meanings.sent2: She felt a subcostal twinge when she laughed too hard.
meanings.sent3: The subcostal space was limited for the expanding lungs.
meanings.sent4: The subcostal region provided stability to the upper body.
meanings.sent5: The subcostal area was sensitive to pressure due to its location.
